Translations.Text: xal kx ri xah nan khux xari
læa xari thi thahı cea di ru wa xal kx ri xahˌ nan khux xari
wan thi mnusʹy ca pen chen mælng mea thi kracay wxn
læa brrda phukhea ca pen chen khnsatw thi pliw wxn
swn phu thi trachu khxng khea hnak
khea k ca xyu nı kar mi chiwit thi phasukh
læa swn phu thi trachu khxng khea bea
thi phanak khxng khea k khux hew luk (ha wi yah)
læa xari lea thi thahı cea ru di wa hew luk khux xari
